meanings.definition: The action of sharing something out among a number of recipients.
meanings.sent1: The distribution of candies at the party was fair.
meanings.sent2: The distribution of flyers in the neighborhood was effective.
meanings.sent3: The distribution of hugs made everyone feel loved.
meanings.sent4: The distribution of sunlight through the trees created a beautiful pattern on the ground.
meanings.sent5: The distribution of stars in the night sky was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The way in which something is shared out among a group or spread over an area.
meanings.sent1: The distribution of food at the shelter was generous.
meanings.sent2: The distribution of resources in the community needs to be improved.
meanings.sent3: The distribution of laughter in the room was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The distribution of clouds in the sky resembled a painting.
meanings.sent5: The distribution of colors in the garden was vibrant.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of a particular feature in a specific pattern or sequence.
meanings.sent1: The distribution of books on the shelf was neat.
meanings.sent2: The distribution of seats in the auditorium was organized.
meanings.sent3: The distribution of jokes in the conversation kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The distribution of leaves on the ground looked like a mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The distribution of waves on the beach was rhythmic.
